The Service
Provider App

Provider App is the primary interface for all Service Providers listed on the platform. They can manage Services, Handymen, Earning, Bookings, and much more.

Buy Now
View Plan
★★★★★ 5/5
#1 Handyman App

Overview

Manage Daily Activities With Ease.

Here's a quick overview video of Provider App and its features.

User interface

Efficient & Elegant Provider App

A User-friendly layout makes it easy for Providers to handle their operations efficiently.

Features

Discover What’s Possible With Provider App

Provider App comes with all the features essential to manage their day-to-day activities with ease.

Set Time Slots

Provider can manage(set/edit/delete) Time Slots to enable slot wise booking.

Add Extra Charges

An additional charges can be added by the Handymen after the job has been completed.

Analytical Dashboard

In a quick glance Provider can view the Monthly Revenue, Services, & Handymen.

Manage Services

Provider has option to Add services & edit services.

Taxes

Providers can manage the taxes that will apply to each service they provide.

Provider Subscriptions

In case of subscription model, Provider can choose plan of his choice to list services.

Manage Handyman

Providers can manage all the Handyman listed in his account.

Provider Wallet

For commission based system Providers keep track of their wallet balance.

Self Assigned Services

Providers can assign booked services to themeselves.

Provider Monthly Revenue

Providers can view and keep track of their monthly revenues.

Handyman Availability Status

Provider can see availability status of their handyman.

Bidding for Custom Jobs

Provider can for bid for custom jobs posted by clients.

rated 4.7 out of 5

Hear What Customers Say About Handyman

Our customers around the globe have openly shown love for the product and our customer service.
